translation.en: [female radio host] It's 75 degrees in sunny San Diego,
and the number one song of the day is still "Blush" by Koop.
translation.ko: 오늘의 1위 곡은 역시 이 노래군요 쿱의 '빨개져'

translation.en: ♪ I feel your eyes on me ♪
♪ You should know better… ♪
Whoo!
♪ You put on the pressure ♪
♪ Something tells me I, I should not let go… ♪
translation.ko: 왠지 느낌이 와 포기하면 안 될 것 같아

translation.en: Whoo! It's my birthday! It's my birthday!
♪ I've been working hard… ♪
translation.ko: 너에게 보여 주려고 이제껏 애써 왔어

translation.en: Whoo! Here we go! Here we go! Here we go!
translation.ko: 너에게 보여 주려고 이제껏 애써 왔어 널 보면 내가 어떻게 되는지

translation.en: It's an impromptu dance party with my best friend since first grade!
-Because it's your birthday! -[both screaming]
Go, go. Work, work. Drop it low. Oh.
translation.ko: 돌리고 돌리고 두 번 더, 아래로

translation.en: I love this song, but I'm very hungry.
Okay, I need your help.
Question. What do you think? Quarter-life chic? Or quarter-life crisis?
translation.ko: 대답해 봐, 어떤 느낌이야? 멋쟁이 25살? 위기의 25살?

translation.en: Huh. Well, right now, you're matching the lamp, so…
-Would a hat help? -[chuckles] No.
Rude!
-Here. -Thank you.
Okay, for my Cassie-palooza kickoff night, we are gonna start off at the club
translation.ko: 캐시 탄생 주간의 첫날 밤 행사는 클럽에서 즐기려고 해

translation.en: where I've spent all afternoon decorating the VIP area.
translation.ko: 내가 오후 내내 장식한 VIP 공간에서 말이지

translation.en: -Hey, I have this crazy idea. -[mouth full] I'm listening.
translation.ko: - 나 대박 아이디어 있는데 - 말해 봐

translation.en: Instead of going out for your birthday, what if we just stay home,
translation.ko: 생일 파티 하러 나가지 말고 집에 머물면 어때?

translation.en: and we put on our stretchy pants, and we puzzle like we used to,
translation.ko: 고무줄 바지 입고 옛날처럼 퍼즐이나 맞추자

translation.en: and we order more noodles?
No, no. We're not staying in. It's my birthday week.
translation.ko: 집에 안 있을 거야 내 생일 주간이라고

translation.en: I have to ring in 25 with style!
You've rung in the past four years with style. One night in won't kill you.
translation.ko: 지난 4년간 본때 있게 놀았잖아 하룻밤 안 나간다고 안 죽어

translation.en: Besides, we haven't puzzled in weeks. I mean, look at Mona.
translation.ko: 게다가 몇 주간 퍼즐도 손 놨지 모나를 봐, 미소를 잃었잖아 나까지 처진다고

translation.en: She is missing her smile, and it's kind of depressing.
translation.ko: 모나를 봐, 미소를 잃었잖아 나까지 처진다고

translation.en: I'm not bailing on my kickoff party. It is tradition. My friends expect this.
translation.ko: 생일 주간을 여는 날인데 기다리는 친구들 바람맞힐 순 없지

translation.en: Well, your best friend has a huge week ahead of her.
I was just added as one of the junior research assistants
translation.ko: 나 얼마 전에 유대류 화석 치아 연구팀의

translation.en: on a team studying marsupial fossil teeth.
I don't fully understand what that means, but congratulations! [squeals]
I'm one of three assistants, so it's really not a big--
translation.ko: 조교가 세 명이나 돼서 별건 아닌데…

translation.en: No, no! It is a big deal. You should celebrate.
translation.ko: 뭔 소리야, 중요한 일이지! 축하해야 해

translation.en: Because guess what? Tonight is… [singsong] …a celebration!
translation.ko: 마침 잘된 거 아냐? 축하의 밤이 기다린다고!

translation.en: Okay. I'm gonna go change. Again.
So should you. Tonight'll be fun, I promise.
translation.ko: 너도 차려입어 신나는 밤이 될 테니까!

translation.en: We leave in an hour-ish.
Love you, my bestie since we were six!
Okay.
Whoo! Did I tell you how cute you look by the way? Uh, yeah, I think you did, like, 19 times. Got it.
translation.ko: - 너 오늘 귀엽다고 내가 말했나? - 19번쯤 말한 것 같은데

translation.en: Good. I meant it every single time. You look adorable.
-I love this dress on you. -Thank you. So, who's coming tonight?
translation.ko: 고맙다, 캐시 오늘 누가 오는 거야?

translation.en: Okay. So Kayla's coming. Maddie's coming.
Moving in?
Oh, hi.
Of course you're moving in. I don't know why I just said that.
translation.ko: 당연히 이사 오는 거겠죠 왜 그런 말을 했을까?

translation.en: Hi, we're your neighbors.
I'm Cassie, and my quiet but highly intelligent roommate is--
translation.ko: 캐시예요, 그리고 이쪽은 차분하고 지적인 내 룸메이트…

translation.en: Lisa. Lisa.
Um, I'm around dinosaur bones all day,
so I'm not really used to talking to people that much.
-Right. -Works in the Museum of Natural History.
Oh wow! Yeah, I compose music for video games all day,
translation.ko: 저도 종일 틀어박혀 게임 음악 작곡하느라

translation.en: so not a lot of human interaction for me either.
translation.ko: 저도 종일 틀어박혀 게임 음악 작곡하느라 인간관계에 서툴긴 마찬가지죠

translation.en: Sorry, I'm Max, by the way.
Ordinarily, I'd shake your hand, but I'd almost certainly drop this,
translation.ko: 보통은 악수하는데 그럼 상자를 떨어뜨릴까 봐요

translation.en: um, and I desperately need these dishes.
-Oh! Here. Let me open the door for you. -Brilliant. Cool.
Cool.
Okay, we've gotta go, but, um, welcome to the neighborhood, Max.
translation.ko: 그럼 우린 가 볼까? 이사 온 걸 환영해요, 맥스

translation.en: -Yeah, thanks. See ya. -Yeah. Yeah.
-Oh, don't give me that look. -What look? I wasn't giving a look.
translation.ko: - 그런 표정 짓지 마 - 내가 뭘 어쨌다고?

translation.en: -You wanna play matchmaker? -I didn't say that.
translation.ko: - 중매라도 하고 싶어? - 네가 말 꺼낸 거다

translation.en: Since you mentioned it, I did notice a spark.
-There was a spark? -Mm!
No, there was no spark.
I'm… I'm really focused on work right now, and I can't have any distractions.
translation.ko: 지금 일에만 집중해야 해 한눈팔 새가 없다고

translation.en: Not even in the form of our new neighbor and his cute accent?
translation.ko: 억양까지 귀여운 이웃집 남자인데 안 돼?

translation.en: I'm not like you.
-Okay. -No, no!
I just mean you can juggle a social life. That's not me.
translation.ko: 넌 나랑 다르게 사회생활에서 균형을 잘 잡잖아

translation.en: Yeah, well, I'm a party planner. It's built into the job.
Well, I'm on a path here.
Nail this junior research position, get promoted to field researcher,
translation.ko: 전임 연구원 경력을 잘 쌓아야 현장 연구원이 될 수 있고

translation.en: and then work alongside my paleontologist hero.
Hey, I wanna introduce you to my friend Fun.
I don't know if you two have ever met.
translation.ko: 너희 한 번도 만난 적 없지?

translation.en: [Lisa] Let me get through all of this stuff first, okay?
translation.ko: 우선 난 해야 할 일부터 할게

translation.en: Downward Dad is out of control. He posts a different pose every day.
translation.ko: 우리 요기 아빠 진짜 못 말려 매일같이 다른 자세를 포스팅하네

translation.en: -[chuckles] I liked his flying crow. -Okay, do not encourage him.
translation.ko: - 한 다리 까마귀 자세 좋더라 - 칭찬해 주지 마

translation.en: What? Wait. It's not just me. Do you see how many people like his yoga studio?
translation.ko: 나만 너희 아빠 팬이 아냐 그 요가 스튜디오 인기 폭발이라고

translation.en: Oh, I know. I've heard from everyone how amazing his classes are.
translation.ko: 저도 알거든요 수업이 대단하다고 소문 쫙 났더라

translation.en: We should take one.
No, I'm good.
I got enough secondhand yoga from him growing up that I am centered for life.
translation.ko: 어깨 너머로 충분히 배웠어 나한테 집중하는 게 중요하단 것도

translation.en: I think it's sweet that he's on social media. It's like he's trying to connect with you.
translation.ko: SNS를 하시다니 다정해 너랑 소통하고 싶으신가 봐

translation.en: Yeah, I love him, but he's my dad, not my buddy.
translation.ko: 그래, 나도 아빠를 사랑하지만 우리가 친구는 아니잖아

translation.en: I'm fine with our lives being separate.
Okay. Well, if you just left one comment, it would probably make his day.
Fine. I'll throw him a like, but no comment.
-You happy? -Mm-hmm.
[Lisa] So this is, like, our 19th Cassie-palooza kickoff.
translation.ko: 캐시 탄생 주간 파티를 연 지 19년쯤 됐나?

translation.en: [Cassie] It's gonna be the best ever!
Hey, Bob.
Good evening, Cassie.
-Thank you. -Ladies, welcome.
She's my favorite person. I love her so much.
translation.ko: 굉장하다니까 그렇게 멋진 여자 처음 봐

translation.en: [man] Cassie's here!
-Wow. This is actually really pretty. -Hi!
-[woman] Happy birthday, Cassie! -[Cassie] Whoo!
[man 2] Happy birthday! It's so good to see you.
translation.ko: 생일 축하해! - 얼굴 보니까 참 좋다 - 내 생일 아니야, 제러미

translation.en: It's not my birthday, Jeremy. Not my birthday.
translation.ko: - 얼굴 보니까 참 좋다 - 내 생일 아니야, 제러미

translation.en: You are the best!
[screams] Yes!
[man] Cassie! Drink, drink, drink!
-["Blush" by Koop playing] -[gasps] It's our song. -It's Koop! -Yeah.
-We have to dance! -[Lisa] Okay.
Come on! Come on!
Go, girl! Go, girl! Go, go! Break it down. Break it down.
Go, Lisa! Go, Lisa!
[woman 2] Yes, Cassie!
I'm flying!
Careful! You're gonna get hurt.
-[crowd chanting] Drink! Drink! -Here! It's your birthday!
Should I do it? Should I do it? Okay.
-[crowd chanting] More! More! More! More! -Oh yeah!
-[Cassie] So much fun! You! -[woman] You kept drinking shots.
translation.ko: 너무 재밌다! - 너 진짜! - 쉬지 않고 마시더라?

translation.en: Because you kept handing them to me!
You're crazy! You're-- I can't keep up with you.
Okay, you guys, next stop is Roddy's house.
I rented a waterslide that goes from the roof into his pool!
translation.ko: 지붕에서 수영장으로 이어지는 미끄럼틀을 빌려 놨지!

translation.en: What's wrong?
You're bailing, aren't you?
I bet you no one would notice if we snuck back home right now.
translation.ko: 지금쯤 우리 둘이 슬쩍 빠져도 아무도 모를 거야

translation.en: I would notice!
You know that these people are terrible, right?
translation.ko: 저 사람들 끔찍한 거 너도 알지?

translation.en: They're just trying to have a good time, which is exactly what you should be doing!
translation.ko: 그냥 즐겁게 노느라 그러는 거야 네 숙제도 그거고, 가자!

translation.en: -Come on. -I like having a good time too.
Only I wanna do it with people who'd actually care if something happened to me,
translation.ko: 날 아끼고 걱정해 주고 사람들과 함께일 때만

translation.en: or who would like me even if I didn't rent a very dangerous waterslide.
translation.ko: 위험한 미끄럼틀을 안 빌려 놔도 날 좋아해 줄 사람들 말이야

translation.en: Don't tell me you're jealous.
I am not jealous of people who look filtered 24/7.
translation.ko: 종일 인스타 필터 낀 듯 사는 애들 질투 안 해

translation.en: [under breath] I don't know! Kinda sounds like you're jealous to me!
-[woman] Come on, Cassie, let's go! -[laughing] Okay, one second!
You know, you're different when you're with them.
[Cassie] I'm what?
It's like you think you aren't worth anything if you aren't seen.
translation.ko: 남들 눈에 띄는 일이 네 인생의 목표인 듯 굴지

translation.en: Well, at least I'm out making friends, and I'm not hiding at my desk.
translation.ko: 적어도 난 나와서 친구를 사귀어 책상에 숨진 않는다고

translation.en: Because I think that there is more to life than partying
translation.ko: 인생엔 파티보다 중요한 게 있다고 생각하니까

translation.en: or knowing all the names of bartenders in town.
translation.ko: 동네 바텐더 이름을 줄줄 외는 일보다 말이야

translation.en: Here we go! My life isn't as important because it's social.
translation.ko: 남들과 어울린단 이유로 내 인생을 깎아내리게?

translation.en: Just because I'm not one of your science friends doesn't mean I don't work hard.
translation.ko: 너희 과학자들만 치열하게 사니? 나도 애쓰며 살아

translation.en: -I didn't say that! -But you meant it!
I see how you only pretend to be interested when I tell you about some event I planned
translation.ko: 내가 진행하는 이벤트 얘기 때마다 흥미로운 척만 하는 거 다 알아

translation.en: or your offhanded comments about how I'm never home.
translation.ko: 야근을 밥 먹듯이 해도 건성으로 반응하지

translation.en: Like you don't pretend to understand my life?
translation.ko: 넌 내 인생을 이해하는 척도 안 하잖아

translation.en: Tell me what I do.
You work at the museum.
But what do I do there?
I don't know. I don't understand that stuff.
translation.ko: 몰라, 내가 이해 못 하는 거야

translation.en: And I don't understand your stuff.
translation.ko: 나도 네 인생 이해 못 하겠어

translation.en: [scoffs, chuckles wryly] Classic.
We never hang out anymore.
Just the two of us.
We're busy. We'll just have to get better at making time for each other.
translation.ko: 둘 다 바쁘니까 서로를 위해 시간을 내면 되잖아

translation.en: I don't know, Cassie. I don't think being friends should feel like work.
translation.ko: 난 잘 모르겠어 친구로 지내는 게 일로 느껴지면 안 되잖아

translation.en: I don't think it does, Lisa.
But I can tell from your face that you do.
It's fine.
I don't wanna stay best friends out of habit anyway.
translation.ko: 나도 습관처럼 절친 사이 유지하는 거 별로야

translation.en: I'm a habit?
Th-- That's it?
You're just gonna say something like that and walk away?
translation.ko: 그런 막말을 해 놓고 그냥 간다고?

translation.en: Maybe it's time we both admit that we've outgrown each other.
translation.ko: 오랫동안 붙어 살았으니 이제 지겨울 만도 하잖아?

translation.en: -[Cassie] Who's ready to go to Roddy's? -[friends cheering]
[Cassie laughs] Let's do it. Sorry about that, guys.
Mona's missing her smile.
Here's one.
Put this here.
That'll fix it.
Oh no.
No, no, no, no.
No. No, no, no.
So stupid.
[sighs] So stupid.
Uh, hi.
Excuse me?
Did that go viral?
Oh, you're awake!
Welcome. Welcome.
No, no, don't worry. No, it's research. It's not gone viral.
translation.ko: 안 퍼졌으니 걱정 마요 조사 중이라서요

translation.en: I'm Val.
I'll be your handler through this transition.
translation.ko: 과도기를 잘 지나게 돕는 당신 매니저요

translation.en: Well, it's nice to finally meet you, Miss Cassandra Adeline Garcia.
Now, according to my notes, you go by Cassie. You're 25--
translation.ko: 제가 조사한 바에 따르면 캐시로 불리고 나이는 25세…

translation.en: -In a few days. -Huh?
Parents, Howie and Sofia, divorced.
Born May 31st, died May 25th.
Died?
Oh, I'm sorry. Died May 26th.
Who… who are you?
I'm Val. Otherwise known as your temporary guardian angel.
translation.ko: 발이에요 다르게 말하면 당신의 임시 수호천사죠

translation.en: You don't look like a guardian angel. Shouldn't you have a halo?
-Oh, special occasions only. -Okay, what about wings?
Oh, no, we phased those out years ago.
translation.ko: 안 쓰기로 결론 낸 지 몇 년 됐어요

translation.en: Okay. This… this can't really be happening.
I was… I was just with my friends.
Oh! I know! I… I had… I had champagne with gold flakes in it,
translation.ko: 이제 알겠어요! 금박을 넣은 샴페인을 마셨는데

translation.en: and sometimes it makes you hallucinate. [laughs] I'm hallucinating.
translation.ko: 그게 가끔 환각을 일으키거든요 이거 환각이네

translation.en: [laughs] No. This isn't a hallucination.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 환각이 아니에요 힘든 순간인 거 알아요

translation.en: Oh, this… this part's always hard.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 환각이 아니에요 힘든 순간인 거 알아요 늘 어렵죠

translation.en: How can I put this?
Yeah, um, you died.
-Stop saying that! -I mean, you saw it yourself, so--
-I died in the bathroom? -Yeah.
Oh! Oh, this keeps getting worse!
[splutters] Look, it's going to be okay.
And the good news is that the worst is over now that you're d--
translation.ko: 다행히 최악의 순간은 지나갔죠 이미 죽…

translation.en: No longer living.
You don't have to deal with all of those human annoyances,
translation.ko: 인간이 감내해야 할 성가신 고통도 끝이죠

translation.en: you know, like heartbreak or PMS.
Just think of the afterlife as one long spa day.
translation.ko: 사후 세계를 스파라고 여기고 느긋하게 즐겨요

translation.en: And if you're one of the lucky ones, it could last for an eternity.
So, I went up?
-[inhales] Well-- -Is this down? I went down?
You're in the middle. We call this the In-Between.
translation.ko: 당신은 중간에 있어요 이곳은 연옥이라고 불리죠

translation.en: So like general admission?
Sure. This is your personal waiting room. It's your safe space.
translation.ko: 네, 여긴 개인 대기실이에요 안전 공간인 셈이죠

translation.en: It's designed specifically to your taste
translation.ko: 당신 취향에 맞춰서 특별히 디자인한 곳이에요

translation.en: to make your transition more… [inhales] …comfortable.
translation.ko: 과도기를 좀 더 편안히 보낼 수 있게요

translation.en: So everyone who dies is in the In-Between?
translation.ko: 그럼 죽은 사람은 전부 연옥에 있나요?

translation.en: Oh no. No, no, no. Maybe I should give you a pamphlet.
No, no! I don't need a pamphlet. Just tell me.
translation.ko: 팸플릿 필요 없어요 그냥 말해 줘요

translation.en: It can't be crazier than anything that's happening.
Well, the In-Between is for those who have unfinished business
translation.ko: 연옥에 오는 사람은 따로 있죠 미처 마무리 못 한 일을 지구에 남기고 온 사람들

translation.en: back on Earth,
translation.ko: 미처 마무리 못 한 일을 지구에 남기고 온 사람들

translation.en: like yourself.
What unfinished business?
Well, you get a second chance to make things right
translation.ko: 명단에 있는 사람들과 엉킨 인연을 푸는

translation.en: with a select list of people,
you know, and if you succeed, you get sent to the Above.
translation.ko: 일을 바로잡는 데 성공하면 천국으로 가요

translation.en: And if you don't, well, you know, it's…
it's just, it's… Yeah, it's, you know… [whistles]
-It's… Yeah. -It…
Yeah.
But I thought it was for murderers and people who don't like Beyoncé.
translation.ko: 그곳엔 살인자랑 비욘세 안티팬만 가는 줄 알았는데

translation.en: -I'm a proud member of the Beyhive. -[chuckles] Yeah.
No, no, it's a tiered system. Yeah.
You want the Above. Trust me.
You ready to meet your list?
Now? No. I'm not ready! Oh!
That was like riding a roller coaster backwards and blindfolded.
translation.ko: 뒤로 가는 롤러코스터를 눈 가린 채 탄 것 같았어요

translation.en: [chuckles] You get used to it.
Wait, we're at my dad's house.
Hey, Dad!
Hey.
Hey!
[Cassie] Why isn't he responding?
He can't see or hear you.
No one can.
What? No, that can't be right.
Well, we can't risk scaring people on Earth.
translation.ko: 겁먹을 게 뻔한데 위험을 감수할 순 없어요

translation.en: They're so fragile.
[Cassie] Hello? Dad?
It's me! It's Cassie, your favorite and only child.
translation.ko: 나야, 캐시 아빠가 제일 아끼는 외동딸

translation.en: He never let me eat junk food.
What is goin' on?
And why is this house such a mess?
translation.ko: 게다가 집은 왜 이렇게 엉망이고? 이건…

translation.en: This… this is not like him.
translation.ko: 게다가 집은 왜 이렇게 엉망이고? 이건… 아빠답지 않아요

translation.en: He's Downward Dad. He's all about healthy living,
translation.ko: 아빠는 요기예요 건강한 삶 그 자체인걸요

translation.en: and he even makes his own kombucha.
How long have I been gone?
Val, how long?
-A year. -A year?
It feels like a day.
Well, time works differently up there.
[sighs] Maybe I should've taken a pamphlet.
[Cassie] The last time he was like this was when my mom left.
translation.ko: 아빠 저러는 거 엄마 떠났을 때 이후로 처음 봐요

translation.en: After you passed,
he gave up.
When was the last time you saw him?
I… I don't know. I…
I kept meaning to visit, but there were all these events.
translation.ko: 찾아올 마음은 있었는데 자꾸만 일이 생겼죠

translation.en: I liked one of his posts. Does that count?
Yeah.
Is that why he's on my list?
He's in mourning.
He needs a reason to feel hopeful again.
Tell me what I should do.
You should see the rest of your list.
Lisa? Really, Val? No. Pass. Hard pass.
translation.ko: 리사요? 너무하네요, 이건 아니죠 무조건 거절요

translation.en: There is no hard pass. There isn't even a regular pass.
translation.ko: 무조건 거절은 선택지에 없어요 심지어 그냥 거절도요

translation.en: What about if I kill it with my dad? Not kill kill. You know what I mean.
translation.ko: 아빠 일을 죽여주게 해낼게요 진짜 죽인단 뜻이 아닌 건 알죠?

translation.en: Can we pretend Lisa isn't on the list?
Why are you so afraid of seeing your best friend again?
-My former BFF, and I'm not. -Mm.
[Cassie] There's too much history between us.
Besides, I don't know if I want to. Some friendships just end, you know?
translation.ko: 굳이 풀어야 하는지도 모르겠고 어떤 우정은 그냥 끝나잖아요

translation.en: Shouldn't I have a say in who's on my list? This is my afterlife we're talking about.
translation.ko: 제 사후 세계인데 명단은 제가 정해야 하는 거 아니에요?

translation.en: [inhales sharply] She's been hiding in her work ever since you left.
translation.ko: 당신이 떠난 뒤로 일 속에 숨어 버렸어요

translation.en: Last one out. It's the same every day.
How about we skip Lisa and move to the next name?
translation.ko: 리사는 건너뛰고 다음 사람 보러 가죠

translation.en: -I'll take it. No complaints. Pinky swear. -No. I don't do that.
translation.ko: - 누구라도 받아들일게요, 약속 - 난 그런 거 안 해요

translation.en: But I will show you who's next on your list.
Please be Koop. Please be Koop. Please be Koop.
How are you doing that?
Oh, you can do it too. It's all part of your basic angel package.
translation.ko: 당신도 할 수 있어요 '천사 패키지'에 포함돼 있거든요

translation.en: You just focus on where you want to go, give a little snap or a nod.
translation.ko: 가고 싶은 곳에 집중하고 손가락을 튕기거나 고갯짓해요

translation.en: One angel I know likes to wink.
Just make it your own. And then you're there.
So, I can go anywhere?
Oh, no, not anywhere.
Your teleporting is limited to places that you're needed only.
translation.ko: 당신을 필요로 하는 곳에만 순간 이동할 수 있어요

translation.en: No detours.
-Got it. -Right. Now, back to the list.
-Ugh. I don't know if I'm ready for more. -[woman] Morgan, slow down!
translation.ko: 더 만날 수 있을지 모르겠어요 모건, 천천히!

translation.en: -Wait for Mommy! -[Morgan giggles]
[in English] Hi, you're so fast. [kisses] Oh.
-That's-- -[Val] Your mother.
I haven't called her that since the day she moved out.
translation.ko: 떠난 이후로 난 전화도 한 통 안 했어요

translation.en: -She's Sofia to me. -[Sofia speaks indistinctly]
[Cassie] Is that my half sister?
I've never met her.
So, you do have some unfinished business, then.
Can we go now, please?
[scoffs] It's only three names.
Not easy ones.
[tuts] Oh, you can do this, Cassie.
-I believe in you. -That makes one of us.
You have the five Earth days leading up to your birthday to complete this list.
translation.ko: 생일까지 지구 시간으로 5일간 꼬인 실타래를 풀어요

translation.en: Wait, five days?
Sure. Why not? Hey, you know what? Why don't we make it two days?
translation.ko: 왜 안 되겠어요? 이틀만 줘도 해결하죠

translation.en: Or better yet, we can just cram it all into one!
Well, just think of it as Cassie-palooza, the afterlife edition.
translation.ko: '캐시 사후 주간'이라고 생각하고 신나게 해 봐요

translation.en: It's… it's like Cassie…
No. No, you're right. Yeah.
Okay, right.
Right, so a name will disappear
translation.ko: 이제 설명할게요 제대로 매듭지었다고 간주하면 이름이 지워질 거예요

translation.en: each time it's deemed that you have closure.
translation.ko: 제대로 매듭지었다고 간주하면 이름이 지워질 거예요

translation.en: How am I supposed to do this if I can't communicate?
Well, you'll find a way.
Can I text? Tweet? TikTok?
No, no, and definitely negatory.
translation.ko: 안 되고 안 돼요 마지막 건 절대 금지

translation.en: Do I at least get cool superpowers, like mind control or something?
translation.ko: 적어도 마인드 컨트롤 같은 초능력은 주셔야죠

translation.en: It's guardian-angel level only.
This is about you learning to really connect with the people closest to you.
translation.ko: 당신과 제일 가까운 사람들과 진심으로 소통하는 법을 깨우쳐요

translation.en: Yeah, and what if I can't?
Well, I'll be here if you need me.
Except between noon and 4:00. [chuckles]
[chuckling] I'm kidding. It's a joke.
Look, I'm always going to be here for you.
translation.ko: 난 언제나 당신 곁에 있을 거예요

translation.en: Now, is there anything else before go time?
Well,
actually, I, um…
I was wondering--
Yeah, yeah. I know what you're thinking.
And, uh, yes,
you do get a wardrobe change.
Yeah, yeah. You just close your eyes and envision what you want to wear.
translation.ko: 눈을 감고 입고 싶은 옷을 상상해 봐요

translation.en: But just so you know, you only get one wardrobe change a day,
so make it count.
-It's so sparkly. -[rock music fades]
I think this might be my favorite part about being here.
translation.ko: 연옥의 삶 중에 이게 가장 마음에 드네요

translation.en: I guess it really is time.
Somebody call Marie Kondo because joy is not sparking here.
translation.ko: 곤도 마리에 좀 모셔야겠네 설렘을 주는 게 하나도 없잖아

translation.en: Lisa first.
Great.
Guess I'm ripping the Band-Aid off.
Okay.
What would Val do?
-I did it. -[whimsical music playing]
What the gamer geek?
Who are you, and what did you do to my room?
translation.ko: 넌 누구니? 내 방에 뭔 짓을 한 거야?

translation.en: Hey.
Oh, the cute neighbor still lives here. Are you two in love yet?
translation.ko: 귀요미 이웃도 아직 있네 둘이 사랑에 빠졌니?

translation.en: -Hey, you. -Hey. Morning.
-Are you just getting home now? -Yeah.
I'm, uh, in the process of scoring this game
about, uh, post-apocalyptic, motorcycle-riding zombie Vikings.
translation.ko: 인류 종말 이후 오토바이 타는 좀비 바이킹이거든

translation.en: It sounds lame now I'm saying it out loud, but it's pretty dope
translation.ko: 말로 설명하니까 구리게 들리는데 실은 꽤 근사해

translation.en: if post-apocalyptic, motorcycle-riding zombie Vikings are your thing.
translation.ko: 종말 이후 오토바이 타는 좀비가 네 취향이라면 말이지

translation.en: You're heading to work early. Oh, no watch.
Yeah, yeah, I, um…
I like getting to work before everybody else, you know? The calm is… is, um--
translation.ko: 남들보다 일찍 가는 게 좋더라고 고요해서…

translation.en: Calming.
-Exactly. -Yeah.
-You get it. -Yeah, I do.
-[Max chuckles] -Yeah.
Cool, well, hopefully one day, when our schedules can align,
translation.ko: 언젠가 서로 일정을 맞출 수 있으면 참 좋겠네

translation.en: um, we can properly hang out? Me and you?
-Yeah. -Yeah?
-Yeah, okay. Okay. Yes, yes. -Yeah.
-Yeah, I would… I would like that. -Brilliant.
-Okay, well, um, I'm gonna go. -Yeah.
-Cool. Well, have a good day. -Thank you. You too.
-Good seeing you. Bye. -Bye.
It's been a year, and you still haven't gone out with him?
translation.ko: 벌써 1년이나 됐는데 아직도 둘이 안 사귄다고?

translation.en: It is a good thing I'm back.
So the way we ended things… Talk about bad timing!
translation.ko: 우리가 절교한 타이밍 말이야 기가 막히게 별로였지?

translation.en: Are you still mad at me?
I know I should still be mad at you, but it doesn't feel right anymore.
translation.ko: 나도 그래야 맞는 거겠지만 이 마당에 무슨 소용이야

translation.en: -When did this place open? -[Lisa laughs]
Ugh! I hate being so out of touch!
Morning, Emme. How are you?
Hi. I've got your order waiting.
Oh my-- Emme, you spoil me.
Who is Emme? I know all your friends, and I don't know her.
translation.ko: 누군데? 네 친구 다 아는데 이 사람은 처음 봐

translation.en: -[Lisa] Okay. -Ta-da!
Oh. Ooh. What is that smell?
I'm working on a new brownie recipe. They're just out of the oven. Wanna try?
translation.ko: 브라우니 요리법을 새로 개발했죠 갓 구웠는데 먹어 볼래요?

translation.en: I will always be your guinea pig.
So, um, how has everything been? Are you feeling a little bit more settled?
translation.ko: 요즘은 어떻게 지내세요? 그래도 조금은 안정감이 느껴져요?

translation.en: [Emme] Things are good.
Haven't seen much of the town yet. I should probably get out more.
translation.ko: 동네 구경은 많이 못 했지만 자주 나가 봐야겠어요

translation.en: Baked goods aren't the best conversationalists.
Well, neither are bones.
I am thinking of throwing a one-year anniversary party for the shop.
That would be so cool. Careful. It's hot.
-Oh! -[Lisa] Okay.
I miss brownies. Why couldn't I have had death by chocolate?
translation.ko: 그리운 브라우니! 초콜릿 먹다 죽었으면 좋았을걸

translation.en: Wow. Wow. I mean, this is… this is incredible.
Oh, it's made with love. And agave.
I need to go to work, but thank you. I'll see you later, okay?
-Ciao for now. -Bye!
Bye.
So, how's your list coming along?
The quiet type, huh?
So…
this is your life now.
Okay.
-You beat me to work. Again. -[gasps, exhales]
Oh, jumpy.
Are you on something?
Next time, bring enough for the whole class! [laughs]
Yeah.
-What do you want, Raj? -[Raj] Did you hear?
Uh, hear what?
Dr. Redding's leading a dig at Hell's Creek this summer,
translation.ko: 올여름 헬스 크리크 발굴 대장이 레딩 박사인데

translation.en: and she's looking for a junior field researcher to join.
Wait, Dr. Marion Redding? Are you messing with me?
Not only that, the GOAT herself is coming into the office
translation.ko: 그뿐 아니라 우리 전설께서 직접 사무실로 오셔서

translation.en: to hold interviews. I'm about to go sign up over at the…
translation.ko: 면접을 보신다니까 나도 휴게실에 붙은 지원서에…

translation.en: break room.
[Cassie] A sign-up sheet.
How retro. But I dig it.
What are you waiting for? Just write your name.
L-I--
-[Raj] Pretty competitive, huh? -[groans]
And she's only picking one person.
I think we all know who that'll be.
R-A-J. B-R-I-T-T-O.
translation.ko: R, A, J, B, R, I, T, T, O

translation.en: [winces] Only four spots left.
Don't listen. He's trying to psych you out in the lamest way possible.
translation.ko: 듣지도 마, 너 주눅 들게 하려고 별 치사한 방법을 다 쓰네!

translation.en: I'm gonna sign up later.
I have a lot of work to do, so I can't really think about this kind of thing right now.
translation.ko: 지금 할 일이 너무 많아서 이걸 신경 쓸 수가 없네

translation.en: Sure.
You're giving up?
In the bag, Britto.
What's so important?
I left a farmer in his barn-themed waiting room for you. Are you okay?
translation.ko: 헛간 테마 대기실에 농부를 놔두고 왔다고요 - 괜찮아요? - 리사 때문에요

translation.en: It… it's Lisa. She's so stubborn.
translation.ko: - 괜찮아요? - 리사 때문에요 너무 고집이 세요 아무래도 저 실패할 것 같아요

translation.en: You know, I don't think this is gonna work.
translation.ko: 너무 고집이 세요 아무래도 저 실패할 것 같아요

translation.en: She doesn't seem to miss me. There's no trace of me anywhere.
translation.ko: 날 그리워하지 않는다고요 어디에도 제 흔적이 없어요

translation.en: Oh, and get this. I've been replaced by this roommate who is full-on dark web.
translation.ko: 새 룸메이트는 어떻게요? 얼굴에 다크 웹이라고 쓰여 있어요

translation.en: -Why aren't you saying anything? -You're saying enough for the both of us.
translation.ko: - 왜 아무 말도 안 해요? - 듣는 것만으로도 벅차서요

translation.en: Look, I know going back is hard,
but you aren't forgotten.
Oh, I don't know about that.
Well, maybe if we cut out all the "I"s and "me"s and look harder,
translation.ko: '나'를 조금만 줄이고 열심히 들여다보면 알게 되겠죠

translation.en: you'll find that she actually does need you.
Why are you sleeping?
There is a whole world out there, and you are missing it.
translation.ko: 온 세상이 널 기다리는데 그냥 놓칠 셈이야?

translation.en: Lisa. Lisa, wake up.
I need to talk to you.
Lisa, wake up!
Wake up! Wake up! Wake up!
Wake up! Wake up!
Come on, Val. This isn't fair.
How am I supposed to do this if my best friend can't see or hear me?
translation.ko: 절친이 날 보지도 듣지도 못하면 방법이 없다고요

translation.en: I need a little help here, please!
[Lisa] Piper, turn down your game.
Trying to sleep.
-Why won't you let me sleep? -[humming continues]
-What's happening? -[splutters] I don't know.
Oh, but it worked!
You can't be… you can't be here. No.
Oh, you can see me?
This is a dream. Maybe a nightmare. Work… work… work has been stressful.
translation.ko: 이건 꿈이야, 나쁜 꿈 일 때문에 스트레스가 심했지

translation.en: You can hear me too?
[gasps] This isn't supposed to be happening.
This is awesome, and crazy, but mostly awesome.
translation.ko: 진짜 최고다 좀 이상하긴 해도 끝내주네!

translation.en: You aren't here. Nope. You died.
Yeah, that sucked.
I don't believe in whatever you are.
translation.ko: 네 정체가 뭐든 난 널 믿지 않아

translation.en: I'm nothing scary! I'm like a junior guardian angel.
translation.ko: 난 무서운 거 아냐! 말하자면 예비 수호천사지 공식적으론 아니지만

translation.en: Well, not officially. I don't know if that's a thing,
translation.ko: 말하자면 예비 수호천사지 공식적으론 아니지만 난 그렇게 이해했거든 아무튼 명칭이 뭐든 상관없어

translation.en: but that's how I make sense of it. Titles aren't important right now.
translation.ko: 난 그렇게 이해했거든 아무튼 명칭이 뭐든 상관없어

translation.en: I'll be back.
Not… not in an ominous way! In a good way.
It's really nice to be able to talk to you again.
translation.ko: 너랑 다시 얘기할 수 있다니 너무 좋아

translation.en: [whispering] Please be gone. Please be…
Sorry for interrupting, but you'll never believe what happened. Lisa--
translation.ko: 방해해서 미안하지만 무슨 일인지 알면 놀랄걸요

translation.en: Can see and hear you. Yep. Yep. Everyone knows. You're trending.
translation.ko: - 리사가… - 이미 알고 있어요 소문 쫙 났죠 트렌딩을 점령했으니까

translation.en: I've heard rumors of this, but I've never experienced it.
translation.ko: 전해 듣는 얘긴 있었지만 실제로 겪은 적은 없다고요

translation.en: Making contact used to be fairly common,
but now, with all the distractions, it's practically non-existent.
translation.ko: 요즘은 방해물이 워낙 많아서 실제론 불가능해졌거든요

translation.en: Well, it happened.
You never forget the first time your friend looks at you in sheer terror.
translation.ko: 겁에 질려 날 보던 그 표정은 절대 잊지 못할 거예요

translation.en: Everyone's staring at me like I'm a unicorn.
This is the Angels' Den. It's the central command of the In-Between.
translation.ko: 여긴 천사의 방이에요 연옥의 핵심 사령부고요

translation.en: Unicorns are in a different area.
A book? Really?
Yes. Don't you just love books?
Okay.
Mm. Here.
Yep, yep, yep. There we are.
Okay. It's quite rare.
"Said In-Betweener can only affect the physical world
once visible to subject."
"It mainly happens in cases
where the people involved were extraordinarily connected."
"Some call it soul mates or kindred spirits."
So,
it might be a fluke in the system,
or it's just you and Lisa.
-We should test it. -Okay.
Go on, then. Start talking to someone. Let's see what happens.
translation.ko: 어서요 누구한테든 말을 걸어요 어떻게 될지 봅시다

translation.en: Okay. Hey! What's up?
Go on.
Hey, guys. How's it goin'?
Hello?
Hey, ladies! Ooh! I like your shoes. [chuckles]
-[women speaking indistinctly] -No? Nothing?
Okay. No one's responding.
I'm usually the center of the party, not on the sidelines. This feels odd.
translation.ko: 어느 파티를 가든 주인공이었는데 기분이 좀… 이상하네요

translation.en: You seem strangely cheerful for someone trying to solve a fluke in the system.
translation.ko: 시스템을 수리하러 온 천사치곤 너무 즐거운 표정이네요?

translation.en: There's just so much energy.
Isn't it beautiful?
You know the saying "angel on your shoulder"? That's who I want to be.
translation.ko: '내 어깨 위의 천사'란 말 알죠? 난 그 천사가 되고 싶어요

translation.en: A guardian angel who's there through all of these stages of life.
translation.ko: 인간 삶의 모든 단계를 함께하는 수호천사요

translation.en: Not just at the end.
So why don't you? It's not my decision to make.
translation.ko: - 그럼 하면 되죠 - 내가 결정할 문제가 아니에요

translation.en: Is this dog barking at me?
[Val] Oh, he can see you!
Yeah. Animals are more open to the spiritual world. Some kids are too.
translation.ko: 동물은 영적 세계에 더 열려 있죠 일부 어린이도 그렇고요

translation.en: No, poppet, we're working. Go back to your owner.

translation.en: It must have been confusing for her, dealing with boys and dating.
translation.ko: 남자나 연애 문제들이 고민스러웠을 텐데 말이야

translation.en: Yeah, but my mom was there for both of us to answer some of the tough questions, so…
translation.ko: 그래도 버거운 문제가 생기면 저희 엄마가 답을 주시긴 했어요

translation.en: Ask her why she left.
I'm sure that this is, like, really hard to talk about, but, um…
translation.ko: 이런 얘기 무척 힘드실 거예요 저도 알지만…

translation.en: Cassie always wanted to know why you left.
There's not one reason.
What did I do to make you leave?
Was it something Cassie did?
No, never.
Cassie, she was an angel.
It was all me.
I…
I was young.
And I thought I knew more than anyone around me.
translation.ko: 내가 세상 누구보다 똑똑한 줄 알았지

translation.en: Sounds like Cassie.
I, uh, had this romantic idea of what I thought being a wife and mother was like.
translation.ko: 누군가의 아내, 엄마가 되는 일을 낭만적으로만 생각했던 거야

translation.en: But in reality,
I wasn't ready to be responsible for anyone.
translation.ko: 난 누구도 책임질 준비가 안 돼 있었어

translation.en: Looking back at it, I see how patient and loving Howie was,
translation.ko: 하위가 얼마나 인내하고 사랑을 줬는지 인제야 깨달았지

translation.en: but at the time,
I found that suffocating.
I said the same thing.
For a while, Howie used to send me
pictures and letters,
telling me about her.
I never knew that.
But I was too ashamed to respond, so he stopped.
translation.ko: 답장하기엔 면목이 없더라 결국 편지는 끊겼지

translation.en: I convinced myself that postcards were an adequate placeholder,
translation.ko: 난 그저 엽서 정도가 적당한 표식이라고 생각했어

translation.en: and one day I'd be able to explain it all, and we'd actually laugh about it.
translation.ko: 언젠가 다 설명해 주면 웃고 넘길 수 있을 거라 기대했지

translation.en: Sounds so ridiculous when I say it out loud.
I… I let her down.
The last time I saw her was college graduation,
and we were like strangers.
I remember.
Now it's too late to make it right.
And I'll never forgive myself for that.
translation.ko: 난 나를 절대 용서 못 할 거야

translation.en: Okay, I've heard enough. [clears throat] I need to go.
If Cassie was here right now,
what would you say to her?
What are you doing? I didn't ask that.
translation.ko: 뭐 하는 거야? 그런 거 필요 없어

translation.en: That I regret not taking her to London.
I should have been there
to help her with her homework,
hold her when she had a nightmare.
translation.ko: 악몽을 꾸면 손도 잡아 주고 말이야

translation.en: I made a lot of selfish decisions.
But one thing that never changed--
One thing that never changed was my love for her. [clears throat]
translation.ko: 캐시를 사랑하는 내 마음은 변함이 없단다

translation.en: If Cassie were here…
I would tell her that the day she was born
was one of the brightest moments of my life.
translation.ko: 내 삶이 가장 빛났던 순간이라고 말해 줄래

translation.en: And running away,
it was my worst.
I just hope she knows how sorry I am.
She does.
She knows.
Are you okay?
[Lisa] Hey.
Hey.
How are we supposed to we finish this if we don't have all the pieces?
God, this is so frustrating. Why did you even choose this puzzle?
translation.ko: 진짜 짜증 난다 왜 이런 퍼즐을 골랐어?

translation.en: Uh, you sure you wanna talk about the puzzle?
translation.ko: 퍼즐 얘기가 하고 싶은 건 아니지?

translation.en: Do you know how hard it was not being able to say everything I wanted to her?
translation.ko: 속내를 터놓지 못하는 게 얼마나 힘든지 아니?

translation.en: I really don't.
I have years of questions.
Yet standing next to her, I found that I just wanted to yell or run away.
translation.ko: 하지만 정작 소피아 옆에 서 보니 악쓰거나 달아나고 싶더라

translation.en: Like mother, like daughter.
Yeah, but you didn't, and that's a really good thing.
Would you have translated if I did?
It upset me that you took the conversation over.
translation.ko: 네 뜻대로만 대화한 것 같아서 언짢았어

translation.en: No, no. I didn't take anything over.
I could tell that she needed to talk to you,
translation.ko: 소피아가 네게 할 말이 있는 것 같았어

translation.en: and you needed to hear what she had to say.
That was for me to decide!
-I'm on your side, Cassie. -Ugh.
I could tell she needed to talk. You needed to hear what she had to say!
translation.ko: 소피아는 네게 할 말이 있었고 넌 그 말을 들었어야 했다니까!

translation.en: You don't get it!
How could you?
You have a perfect life, a perfect future. I have none of those.
translation.ko: 넌 나랑은 달리 완벽한 인생과 미래를 가졌으니까!

translation.en: Okay, okay. You're mad at your mom. That's totally understandable, but…
translation.ko: 그래, 알겠어 너희 엄마한테 화가 나겠지 그 마음 나도 이해해

translation.en: You know what? It's… [sighs]
It's not okay for you to take it out on me.
Sorry. Does my messy non-life make you uncomfortable?
Here we go again. Classic.
I died before I ever got a chance to live!
Well, I'm hurt too! Did you think about that, huh?
translation.ko: 나도 상처받았어! 그런 생각은 해 봤니?

translation.en: God, after our fight,
after you left, I had to carry around the guilt of our fight.
translation.ko: 넌 떠나 버렸고 난 그 죄책감을 짊어져야 했어

translation.en: I had to pick up the pieces, put my life back together without you.
translation.ko: 부서진 조각들을 주워서 너 없는 삶을 꾸려야 했고!

translation.en: Well, you did a great job. Look around! There's nothing left of me!
translation.ko: 참 잘했더라 내 흔적이 하나도 없잖아

translation.en: I've been reduced to a box of knickknacks!
After everything that's happened, I can't believe we're back to arguing.
translation.ko: 그런 일을 겪고도 또 싸우다니 우리 대단하네

translation.en: Yeah.
Well, I'm dead,
so you don't have to worry about arguing with me ever again.
translation.ko: 또 싸울 일은 없을 테니까 걱정 안 해도 돼

translation.en: You cannot bring that anger in here.
translation.ko: 여기까지 분노를 끌고 오면 안 돼요

translation.en: Look, I… I met with my mom. I got Lisa a boyfriend.
translation.ko: 엄마도 만났고 리사한테 애인도 만들어 줬고

translation.en: I've been talking to my dad even though he can't hear me.
translation.ko: 아빠랑 얘기도 했어요 제 말은 듣지 못했지만

translation.en: Isn't that enough? Do I have to go back?
Well, not if you don't want to.
Thank you.
Well, then, why don't I just walk you over to the elevator?
When you get there, hit "B" for Below.
-Very funny. I get it. -No, you don't.
Why would you risk throwing away everything you've worked toward?
translation.ko: 이제껏 애썼던 걸 왜 내팽개치려는 거예요?

translation.en: And over an argument?
You were doing so well.
-You think I'm doing well? -Yes, I do. Don't you?
I don't know. Maybe.
I hoped I wouldn't have to tell you this, but here we are.
translation.ko: 이런 말은 꺼내고 싶지 않았는데 어쩔 수 없네요

translation.en: If you really want this to end now, I can make that happen.
translation.ko: 정말 지금 끝내고 싶다면 그렇게 해 줄 수 있어요

translation.en: But just know, if you leave the list unfinished,
translation.ko: 하지만 알아 둬요 명단을 해결 못 하고 떠나면

translation.en: then all the good you've been doing will be undone.
translation.ko: 이제껏 이뤘던 모든 게 없던 일처럼 사라져요

translation.en: Everything?
Lisa?
My dad? Everything.
Oh, that's… that's terrible.
I can't… I can't do that to them.
-[exhales sharply] -So, you've made your decision?
Dad, I really need to talk--
-What is she doing here? -More tea?
Please.
I still can't believe you left your accounting practice
to open a yoga studio.
You always joked about it, but I never thought you'd actually do it.
translation.ko: 그저 농담인 줄 알았지 진짜 이럴 줄은 몰랐어

translation.en: [Howard] I also joked about becoming a drummer in an '80s cover band.
translation.ko: 80년대 음악 커버 밴드의 드러머가 되겠다고도 했는걸

translation.en: -[chuckles] I remember that one. -This was a better lifestyle choice.
translation.ko: - 기억난다 - 더 나은 삶을 선택한 거지

translation.en: [chuckles] It suits you.
You might not have said that a few days ago.
translation.ko: 며칠 전엔 그런 말 못 했을걸?

translation.en: This past year has been a challenge.
[Sofia] You know, Lisa visited me today.
I know this may sound nutty.
During that visit, it…
it was almost as though Cassie were standing right beside me.
translation.ko: 캐시가 바로 내 곁에 서 있는 것처럼 느껴지더라

translation.en: I know what you mean.
She was a lot like you though.
Fearless, independent.
She'd dive headfirst into… [chuckles] …any situation.
translation.ko: 그 어떤 경우에도 앞뒤 안 가리고 돌진했어

translation.en: But more than anything,
she was this force of energy who lit up every room she entered.
translation.ko: 무엇보다 에너지로 똘똘 뭉쳐진 아이라 어디에 있든 빛났고

translation.en: After Lisa left, I, um…
I had this overwhelming urge to see you.
I just need you to know how deeply sorry I am for walking out.
translation.ko: 이것만 알아줘 당신과 리사를 떠나서 진심으로 미안해

translation.en: It wasn't how I saw life going, that's for sure.
Your leaving forced me to become a better man, a better parent,
translation.ko: 당신 빈자리를 채우려면 더 좋은 사람, 아빠가 돼야 했어

translation.en: even when she didn't want me to,
and I hope that in some way I was able to minimize whatever scars she had.
translation.ko: 그 아이의 상처를 최대한 빨리 아물게 하고 싶은 마음이었지

translation.en: Yeah, I know you did.
[clears throat] Look, I've kept you long enough.
Thanks for this. [chuckles]
You know, I don't know if it's the palo santo in the air or this dandelion tea talking,
translation.ko: 팔로 산토를 피워서 그런지 민들레 차 때문인지 몰라도

translation.en: but I feel as though Cassie, wherever she is--
Brought us back together.
[Cassie] Mom, wait!
I forgive you.
So proud of you.
That felt good.
I can tell. I mean, you seem lighter.
Hey, so, um…
I need a favor. It's for a good cause, I swear!
translation.ko: 부탁이 있어요, 좋은 거예요, 제 목을 걸죠

translation.en: No swearing.
I didn't actually swear!
There's this bakery, and the owner seems like a really thoughtful person.
translation.ko: 빵집이 하나 있는데 그 주인이 굉장히 따뜻한 분이에요

translation.en: I know she's not on my list, but I think I can help her and help my dad.
translation.ko: 제 명단에 있는 사람은 아니지만 아빠랑 그분을 도울 수 있을 것 같아요

translation.en: We're not running a matchmaking service here.
I know, but they could both use a kind person in their life.
translation.ko: 알지만 두 사람한텐 다정한 친구가 필요해요

translation.en: This could also be a thank-you to Emme for being such a good friend to Lisa since I've been gone.
translation.ko: 저 대신 리사 곁을 지켜 줬던 에미한테 감사할 겸 말이에요

translation.en: I've never had anyone want to add to their list before.
translation.ko: 명단을 추가해 달라는 부탁은 처음 받아 본다고요

translation.en: I've also never had anyone like you before.
[clicks tongue] I'll allow it.
-[exclaiming] Thank you! -Oh!
You're the best! Thank you! Thank you!
Yeah, but you're still on the same timeline. Tomorrow is your last day, Cassie.
translation.ko: 하지만 마감은 그대로예요 내일이 마지막 날이고요

translation.en: I got this. [sighs]
Perfect.
I can't leave it like this. It's a bakery, not Grandma's basement.
translation.ko: 도무지 봐 줄 수가 없네 할머니네 지하실이 아니라 빵집이잖아

translation.en: Are you behind this too, Cassie?
I like your faith in me, Dad.
[Sofia] Morgan, mijita, are you dressed?
translation.ko: 모건, 우리 딸 옷 다 입었니?

translation.en: [in Spanish] We're leaving in five minutes.
[in English] We don't wanna be late again.
Would you like some tea?
You can see me?
I saw you at the park too.
Aren't you scared?
You're my guardian angel.
Ask your mom to read this to you.
I will.
This is our secret, okay?
[woman whispers] Dr. Redding.
I wish Cassie was here.
[Cassie] I'm right here.
Hey.
Hey.
I do have a piece of you.
-It's from our very first puzzle. -Yeah.
translation.ko: - 우리가 맞췄던 첫 퍼즐 조각 - 응

translation.en: It's, uh, it's kinda like my lucky charm.
I thought you were done with me.
There are no grudges in the afterlife.
translation.ko: 사후 세계에 원한 같은 건 없거든

translation.en: Are there any here?
No. No, no. I do not wanna lose any more time with you.
translation.ko: 절대 없지 이젠 너와의 시간을 단 1초라도 놓치긴 싫거든

translation.en: -[sobs] Neither do I. -[whispering] No, no, no!
-I don't think I can explain an air hug. -Good point.
translation.ko: - 허공 포옹은 이상해 보여 - 좋은 지적이야

translation.en: Yeah.
Okay, so what's the problem? Why are you hesitating?
translation.ko: 왜 그래? 문제가 뭔데? 왜 망설여? 네 미래가 달린 일이야

translation.en: This is yours to lose.
translation.ko: 문제가 뭔데? 왜 망설여? 네 미래가 달린 일이야

translation.en: Yeah, exactly.
Cassie, what if I don't get it? What then?
You'll survive, and you'll go on to something even better.
translation.ko: 끈질기게 살아남아서 더 좋은 일을 꿰차야지

translation.en: No. No.
[sighs] Look at me. Do you want this?
-Yeah. -Are you the best person for this job?
[hesitates] Yeah.
I'm not buying that yeah. You gotta try again.
Are you the best person for this?
Yeah! I am the best person for this!
Yes! There's my strong friend! Life is too short to be fearful.
translation.ko: 씩씩해서 좋다 겁에 질려 있기엔 인생이 짧아!

translation.en: Yeah, Cassie, I eat, I sleep, I drink this job.
translation.ko: 그래, 캐시 이 일은 내 몸이고 숨이고 삶이야

translation.en: If I got this job, I'd crush it so hard, they'd name a freaking fossil after me.
translation.ko: 뽑히기만 하면 본때를 보여 줄래 내 이름을 딴 화석도 생길걸?

translation.en: -I would-- -Use that energy and go sign up!
Right! Sign up first. Dominate second.
translation.ko: 그래, 본때를 보여 주려면 신청부터 해야지

translation.en: -Yes. -[exhales sharply, grunts]
Oh, I've created a monster.
I love it.
Phew. Bam, bam. Good luck.
Hi. [chuckles]
I've heard nice things about you, Lisa.
-Thanks. -I'm glad you decided to interview.
And last too.
That's a bold move.
Shows the competition you're not worried about who came before.
translation.ko: 내 앞에 누가 면접을 보든 신경 안 쓴단 뜻인가요?

translation.en: Oh, um, I didn't plan that--
Modesty's a myth that was sold to women a long time ago.
translation.ko: 겸손이란 여성에게 주입된 구닥다리 통념일 뿐이에요

translation.en: Be proud of your work.
Why paleontology?
I love digging in dirt,
and I hated when people told me that it wasn't a proper career for a lady.
translation.ko: 여성에게 적합하지 않은 일이란 말은 지긋지긋하지만요

translation.en: But, uh, mostly, I found it comforting studying what is real.
translation.ko: 무엇보다 중요한 건 실재하는 걸 연구한다는 점에서 제게 위안이 돼요

translation.en: With fossils, it's like this tangible connection to the past, you know?
translation.ko: 화석은 과거와 현재를 잇는 실체적인 연결 고리잖아요

translation.en: But, uh, now I've…
I've started learning from what I…
I can't see.
-Bye. -Bye.
-Bye. -See you.
Cassie?
-I got it! I got it! -[screaming]
-I got the job! I got it! -You got it! [squeals]
Thank you so much for the push. I couldn't have done it without you.
translation.ko: 고마워, 네 응원 덕분이야 너 없이는 불가능했다고

translation.en: -It was all you. -No, I can't even believe I did it.
translation.ko: - 네가 잘한 거지 - 내가 해냈다니 믿기질 않아

translation.en: -Um, I can! -This is, like, the best day of my life.
translation.ko: - 난 믿어지는데 - 내 인생 최고의 날이다

translation.en: -So proud of you! -Thank you.
So, are you gonna come to Emme's tonight? I'm bringing Max.
translation.ko: 이따가 에미네 빵집 올 거야? 맥스도 데려가려고

translation.en: I wouldn't miss it.
You made it!
[Emme] Thank you so much for coming.
Excuse me. Hello.
I think I'm in the right place?
If you're here for the party, then yes, you are. I'm Emme.
Would you like a homemade fortune cookie?
-Don't mind if I do. -[Emme chuckles]
-"You don't need to look any further." -[Emme] Oh.
I guess this is the right place.
How did you hear about my little soiree?
Honestly, my home was filled with your fliers.
translation.ko: 솔직히 말하면 집 안에 이 전단이 가득했죠

translation.en: No explanation. I have my suspicions, but no one would believe them.
translation.ko: 설명은 안 되지만 심증은 있죠 아무도 안 믿겠지만요

translation.en: Well, since we're being honest,
my shop didn't look like this when I closed up last night.
I woke up this morning, and voilà.
I've got my suspicions too.
Someone's either looking out for us, or we need to get our locks changed.
translation.ko: 누군가 우릴 보살피나요? 아니라면 자물쇠를 바꿔야겠죠

translation.en: Can I get you a green tea?
-I've got sencha, matcha-- -Matcha?
Of course.
-What did you say your name was again? -Howard.
-Some people call me Howie. -Howard.
It means "strong heart."
Well, that went better than expected.
It is fascinating the many ways that people can make a living, isn't it?
translation.ko: 사람들이 삶을 꾸리는 방식이 이렇게 다양하다니 신기하지?

translation.en: -Look at that. -Come on.
Okay.
[Emme] I'd really love to do gluten and dairy-free.
translation.ko: 글루텐과 유제품은 안 쓰고 해 보고 싶어요

translation.en: That's a new development.
Come on. I'll introduce you.
[Emme] Hey, look.
-Hi, Mr. Garcia. -Lisa!
-Hi. -Oh!
-What are you doing here? -I could ask you the same.
-Welcome to the party. -Hi, Emme! Hi!
She's one of my regulars. And I suspect is some of the reason I had this makeover.
translation.ko: 우리 집 단골이거든요 빵집의 미스테리한 변신과 관련이 있는 인물이죠

translation.en: If only I knew how you got in here.
Well, I'll never tell.
So this is Max. He's, um,
my…
[splutters] Boyfriend. Hi.
-Uh, wait, sorry. Is that cool? -One hundred percent.
And how do you two know each other?
Lisa and my daughter were best friends.
-What? Are you Cassie's dad? -Yeah.
[Emme] I've heard a lot about her.
Um, I just have to make a call. I'll be right back.
-All right. -Okay.
Someone has been busy. Are you still playing Cupid?
translation.ko: 아주 바빴겠네? 큐피드 놀이 안 끝난 거야?

translation.en: Can I help it if their paths crossed? [laughs]
You still can't talk to him, huh?
No.
It's my last day. But he seems happier, and that's what's important.
translation.ko: 오늘이 마지막 날인데 그래도 행복해 보여서 좋아 그게 중요하지

translation.en: What's with the "huh"?
You can go anywhere I can go, right?
translation.ko: 내가 가는 곳은 너도 갈 수 있지?

translation.en: I mean, if I'm needed. Why?
After this party, I need you to find me. No questions asked.
translation.ko: 파티가 끝나면 날 찾아와 줘 질문은 안 받아

translation.en: -What are you up to? -You're not the only one with surprises.
translation.ko: - 무슨 꿍꿍이야? - 너도 좀 놀라 봐야지

translation.en: You have to find me after and not before, okay?
translation.ko: 파티가 끝난 다음에 날 찾아야 해 알았지?

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay.
[Lisa] Hey, everyone.
I wanna thank you so very much for coming.
We're obviously here because of our beloved Cassie,
translation.ko: 사랑하는 캐시 덕분에 저희가 이렇게 모였죠

translation.en: um, who left us a year ago this week, but, um,
I really don't want this to be about loss
because this is also the week that she came into our lives.
translation.ko: 이 특별한 주간에 캐시가 우리 삶에 깃들었으니까요

translation.en: One thing we know about our Cassie is that her joyous life was a party.
translation.ko: 캐시의 즐거운 삶은 파티였다는 거 모두 잘 아시죠?

translation.en: Especially the week of her birthday, or as she called it…
translation.ko: 특히 생일이 있던 일주일은 더했죠 이름하여…

translation.en: -Cassie-palooza. -Cassie-palooza.
translation.ko: - 캐시 탄생 주간 - 캐시 탄생 주간

translation.en: [smacks lips] So, these wish lanterns that you're holding
translation.ko: 이제 각자 손에 든 소망의 등불로

translation.en: will carry whatever you wanna say to her.
And as they float across the water,
translation.ko: 등불에 실린 마음은 물결을 따라 흘러

translation.en: your thoughts will be sent to her.
translation.ko: 등불에 실린 마음은 물결을 따라 흘러 캐시한테로 가겠죠

translation.en: [whispers] Okay, Morgan, why don't you go first? Okay?
Hey. This entire time, I thought I was the one helping all of you, but…
translation.ko: 리사 이제껏 모두를 돕는 게 나라고 생각했거든

translation.en: all this has me realizing that…
you were the ones helping me.
I'm not… I'm not ready to lose you again.
translation.ko: 다시 널 보낼 준비가 안 됐어

translation.en: We got a second chance. Not everyone can say that.
translation.ko: 우린 두 번째 기회를 얻었잖아 흔한 일은 아니야

translation.en: I want you to know you're more than just my best friend
translation.ko: 가장 친한 친구나 퍼즐 파트너란 말은

translation.en: and my puzzle partner, okay?
You're my family.
[sobs] And you're mine.
I couldn't imagine going through this life or any other without you.
translation.ko: 네가 없었다면 난 어떻게 살았을지 상상도 안 돼

translation.en: ♪ I may not always love you ♪
♪ But as long as there are… ♪
Wait, that's it.
That's the song he would always sing to me as a kid.
translation.ko: 어릴 때 아빠가 늘 불러 주던 노래

translation.en: ♪ You never need to doubt it ♪
♪ I'll make you so sure about it ♪
♪ 'Cause God only knows What I'd be without you ♪
translation.ko: 그대 없는 나는 상상할 수도 없지

translation.en: He can't hear me.
Hey, we'll do this together, okay?
♪ If you should ever leave me ♪
♪ Though life would still go on Believe me ♪
[Lisa and Cassie] ♪ The world could show nothing to me ♪
♪ So what good would living do me? ♪
♪ 'Cause God only knows What I'd be without you ♪
translation.ko: 그대 없는 나는 상상할 수도 없지

translation.en: ♪ God only knows what I'd be without you ♪
translation.ko: 그대 없는 나는 상상할 수도 없지

translation.en: I'm not afraid to go anymore, Dad.
translation.ko: 나 이제 떠나는 게 두렵지 않아

translation.en: I love you, pumpkin.
I love you too, Dad.
I gotta go.
Bye.
Bye.
You're cutting it a bit close.
I always like to be the last one to leave a party.
Wait, please. I have to find one last thing.
We have to be back before time runs out. You don't want to tempt fate.
translation.ko: 정해진 시간 내로 돌아가야죠 운명에 도전할 순 없다고요

translation.en: -It's important. It's for Lisa. -Cassie!
[Cassie gasps] There it is!
I found it! The final piece. The list is complete.
-What's that look? -Your time is up.
translation.ko: - 표정 왜 그래요? - 시간 다 됐어요

translation.en: Happy birthday, Cassie.
-What did they decide? -Well, you missed your deadline.
There's no getting around that.
We also broke the rules by going off the list.
translation.ko: 명단과 상관없는 일도 했죠 규칙 위반이에요

translation.en: However, you did those things in good faith.
translation.ko: 하지만… 그 모든 일은 선의에서 비롯됐던 거였죠

translation.en: The fact you'd risk your afterlife to help someone not on your list
translation.ko: 명단에 없는 사람을 돕느라 당신의 내세를 걸었죠

translation.en: and take full responsibility to protect me,
translation.ko: 날 지키기 위해 모든 책임을 지려 했고요

translation.en: well, I mean, it's just…
it's beyond selfless.
So you're not in trouble?
Even better.
Thanks to your testimony,
I've been promoted.
[screams] You have? Val, that's amazing!
I know! [laughs]
Yeah.
I'm afraid to ask, but…
what about me?
It's time to find out.
And for my last job…
[sobs] I'm gonna miss you, Val.
The world is a better place with you watching over it.
translation.ko: 당신이 지켜봐 주면 세상은 더 좋은 곳이 되겠죠

translation.en: I was your favorite, wasn't I?
Cassie,
you know I don't pick favorites.
translation.ko: 난 그런 순위 못 매기는 거 알면서

translation.en: -We did it! -No, you did it.
The Above is waiting.
[mouthing] Thank you.
Going up?
Okay, I have to address the elephant in the elevator.
-Muzak, really? -You're Kooper Keene!
I think it's meant as a compliment since we're both in here together.
translation.ko: 당신과 함께라는 게 너무 기쁘단 뜻으로 이해해 줘요

translation.en: We're here together?
Like, how can this be real? Is this real? Are you real?
[chuckles] Yes, I am.
It's nice to meet you, Cassie.
You know my name? [laughs]
How? Why?
Funny story.
I was volunteering in a disaster relief area
when disaster struck again.
I was able to save a few people, but I didn't make it.
translation.ko: 몇 명은 구할 수 있었지만 저는 결국 못 버텼죠

translation.en: I am so sorry. There's worse ways to go.
translation.ko: - 정말 유감이에요 - 더 나쁜 죽음도 있잖아요

translation.en: Yeah, there sure are.
Val was in the angel committee that sent me straight up.
translation.ko: 천사 위원회의 발이 절 곧장 위로 보냈죠

translation.en: She said that we were supposed to meet.
This is gonna sound really weird,
um, but I feel like I've always known you.
So do I. [chuckles]
What now?
I don't know.
I've never been dead before.
Shall we do this?
[Cassie] Let's do this.
[mouthing] Thank you.
♪ What brings you up Can only leave you low ♪ ♪ I lie awake and wonder where I'll go ♪
